Description:
Phantom-of-the-Opera-esque AU. 
There have always been rumors surrounding Shiz Academy for Gifted Girls. When Glinda Arduenna is accepted there, she finds that some of the rumors just might be true—rumors about the mysterious figure who haunts the school...
Author: neednot

Description:
Elphaba had recently come into an inheritance, receiving a beautiful mansion that seemed to be stuck in the 1920s. When friends are invited over for a party, the dark truth about the mansion is revealed, and the guests are faced with a question- Who will escape the night? 
(Based off the show Escape the Night by Joey Graceffa)
Author: TurquoiseDragon

Description: A mortal and a Goddess fall for each other despite all difficulties and problems.
Author: IgraineNofear

Description: Glinda wakes up with only one thing on her mind.... can you guess what it is? Skateboarder AU universe.
Author: Tiniestgay

Description: Anthology of one-shots inspired by Soulmate prompts. Each chapter is based off a different prompt, but the endgame is always Gelphie.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: The sacred Clock of the Time Dragon has finally ceased ticking. Fearing an apocalypse, the citizens of Oz choose brave Glinda the Good to go inside the clock itself and explore. While inside, she finds more than just answers to the Clock. She also finds an old friend, and answers to what lies in store for them and for all of Oz.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: While wandering the city streets alone at night, Glinda the Good meets a woman who, though she does not appear to be from Oz, resembles her in the most uncanny and personal of ways. That woman then offers her some sage advice and encouragement to chase her dreams, her morning, before it is too late.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: For some reason, Galinda was never ever afraid of Elphaba. Even back when they hated each other, Galinda was the only person to never ever flinch away from Elphaba. It was one of the first things Elphaba ever noticed about her, and one of the most interesting. But why? Why was Galinda never scared of her?
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Elphaba had needed glasses all her life and, just like with her skin, they were always used against her. Then along came Galinda. After a bit of a rocky start, the two became friends, and in time, Galinda went from being the one breaking Elphaba's glasses to fixing them.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: One night, Elphaba receives the strangest of visitors in the strangest of ways. It is a young woman who clambers across the roof of their apartment in order to come through the window. Following that first meeting, these rooftop visits become totally normal and Elphaba strikes up a friendship, and then something more, with the mysterious young visitor.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: What was supposed to be a normal bus ride to school quickly devolved into something far more interesting when a certain young blond with a backpack full of makeup, shoes and hair and skincare products plopped down beside Elphaba that morning and proceeded to give her lessons in Popularity.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Waking with a start, Glinda finds herself in an old, majestic castle. Its mysterious green-skinned owner says that she rescued Glinda from a battle. Glinda believes her easily enough and spends a pleasant recovery with her, but for some reason, something feels... off... Like there's something that the green woman knows that she doesn't. But what?
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Galinda comes home one night, totally wasted, and starts to hit on Elphaba. Once Elphaba manages to get Galinda off of her, she decides to use Galinda's inebriation to her own advantage and finally get some answers to the questions she's been dying to ask, namely, why Galinda thinks Elphaba is so attractive. This should be an interesting night.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Elphaba and Glinda move to the Emerald City together and get married. What does day-to-day life look like for them now? (Pure, plotless domestic Gelphie fluff).
Author: lrhaboggle
Fanfic_Title: Without a Care in the World

Description: Standing in the hidden corner at the back of the chapel, Elphaba watches Glinda's wedding. She comes to support Glinda, but Oz knows she wishes she could be the one waiting at the altar as opposed to the one hiding in the shadows.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: What if Fiyero did shoot Glinda during the Catfight? What if it was Glinda who was dragged away to be tortured and interrogated. Would Elphaba be able to save her friend this time? Or would it all still only end in suffering and misery? What would become of Glinda?
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: What was going through Glinda's mind during the Catfight scene in the musical? Was it really Fiyero she was so cut up about losing? Or was it really still all only about Elphaba?
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Following a mispronounced spell, Elphaba and Galinda find themselves in a very awkward situation. Leave it to Galinda, though, to try and lighten the mood even when trapped in the body of a small, furry Animal.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Turns out, Elphaba has a teddy bear. But for obvious reasons, she keeps it hidden. But luckily for her, Galinda is a very understanding roommate. And in fact, as she reveals, she has a teddy bear too!
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: When Galinda finds out that Elphaba is writing a science-based essay, she capitalizes on the moment with her own brand of playful humor.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: After befriending Elphaba, Galinda realizes how fake her original friend group had been. She still misses them, but hearing them slander her and Elphaba make her realize that she has found a far truer friend in Elphaba than she'd ever had in anyone else ever before. Well and truly, Elphaba had changed her life for good.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: An anthology of Gelphie one-shots set in Hogwarts.
Author: lrhaboggle
Fanfic_Title: The Untold Story of the Witches of Hogwarts

Description: When a tornado strikes Kiamo Ko, Elphaba and Glinda find themselves in a very different land from the one they left behind. It's some strange little farm called "Kanziz" and along the way, they meet a little girl named Dorothy Gale, her dog, Toto, and her spiteful old neighbor, Almira Gultch.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Galinda can be a handful, as Elphaba well knows. It's especially difficult to look after the young socialite because she's always out at the bars and pubs, getting wasted. But it doesn't matter, not really, because Elphaba loves Galinda, and there is nothing she won't do to keep her little idiot safe.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Even from their days of loathing, Elphaba and Galinda noticed every little trait about each other. Could anyone really say they were surprised when those days of loathing turned to loving? And when those little traits became endearing instead of annoying?
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: In the peace and quiet of their dorm room, Elphaba and Galinda sit in silence, one reading and one looking into a mirror. Or are they? For Elphaba has not flipped a single page in over 10 minutes and it is not her own face that Galinda is staring at through her vanity.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description:
Didn't know how to summarize this.
Elphaba is an immortal witch, Glinda is a queen, there's socioeconomic political tensions and also romance.
Author: show_me_the_universe

Description: For centuries, werewolves and vampires have been enemies, but sometimes, friendships and romances can spring up from the most unlikely of places.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: "Bravo! Encore! What a show!" the ecstatic shouts filled the theater hall and, in response, one by one, every single actor assembled onto the stage for one final bow. The leads were the last to go, taking center stage together, hand in hand even after the curtain had fallen to signal the end of the show. What a glorious night it had been!
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: When an alarm wakes up all the residents in Elphaba's dorm, Elphaba finally gets to meet the mysterious girl living by herself in the very last dorm of the hall. Maybe the meeting would've been interesting, but Elphaba was too distracted by the fact that this new girl apparently only slept in skimpy underwear to do more than gawk.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: After all they had been through, both alone and together, who would've ever imagined that the one thing finally capable of keeping the two strongest witches in all of Oz apart would be a mere door?
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: It was Galinda's idea, really. Who else would be so childish and silly as to suggest using perfume bottles to convey "secret messages" to her best friend/roommate? But, come 20 odds years later, that little game of theirs just might come back into play one more time, only this message will be far more vital and important than any other message sent before it.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Elphaba may have been dead for quite some time, but Glinda still sees her in dreams and hallucinations. Or at least, she thinks that they are hallucinations. But who knows? Maybe these phantom visions of Elphaba aren't quite as false as she thinks...
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: After Elphaba's little stunt against the Wizard, Glinda is lucky to have made it out alive. Even more than that, though, she's relieved that Elphaba managed to survive the incident as well and be able to make her way back home to Glinda. Right?
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: With the Wizard finally gone and Glinda finished with her daily duties as the new Ozian leader, Glinda finally has the chance to take some time off and visit her old best friend again and reconnect.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Glinda has finally defected away from the Wizard and to Elphaba. Sadly, the choice she makes is not without its consequences and she and Elphaba both end up paying a very terrible price.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: For her entire life, Galinda had never truly been content with the places that she called home. The Uplands, Shiz, the Emerald City Palace. None of them were truly home. But as she had since come to learn, home wasn't always a place. Sometimes, it was a person...
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: As the new queen of Oz, life gets incredibly tough for Glinda the Good. Thank Oz that, during one of her campaigns to increase the protection of Animals and animals alike, she manages to find a companion that she can finally truly relate to and speak with safely.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Elphaba wasn't quite sure when she had started to fall for Galinda, she only knew that she had, and it was a love that was growing stronger and stronger every day. But Galinda, dear, sweet Galinda, was blind to it all, and Elphaba was far too afraid to ever bring it up.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Galinda discovers that Elphaba is ticklish, amused by the realization that the green girl has such an adorable weakness, Galinda exploits it in any way she can. But she should've known better, Elphaba isn't one to take things lying down. (Pure fluff)
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Galinda walks in on Elphaba while Elphaba is in the shower. Embarrassing as that was, Galinda can't help but admit that the view isn't half bad. A few months later, Galinda now has no problem barging in on Elphaba's showers if it so suits her.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Winter at Shiz had reached an all-time low this year and even those safe away in their dorms were left frozen. When Galinda starts to complain, it's up to Elphaba to be her knight in shining armor and help keep her warm. Luckily, there are a lot of ways to do that, as they come to find out... (Gelphie fluff)
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: For all of her life, Galinda had always wanted to be an architect. Sadly, because she never had much support from her parents, that dream was left unfollowed. But then one day, Galinda finally found herself a supporter, and it came from the very last person she would've ever imagined, though as she would come to realize, maybe it wasn't so surprising after all...
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: For their whole lives, Elphaba and Galinda had lied and hidden. No one had ever really cared about what really lay underneath the surface of these two witches, at least until they met each other. Then, through the strangest of circumstances, the two realized just how similar they really were, and that was a trait that bound them together deeper than blood ever could.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: For all of her life, Elphaba was led to believe that she clashed with every color of the rainbow. After enough years of hearing this, she began to believe it. But then a certain young blond came into her life and taught her that there was one color that actually went very well with green.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: The feeling of Want was a funny thing, because it seemed like no matter what you had, you always wanted more. Would such an endless longing ever cease, or was this sort of paradoxical and cyclical nature of desire everlasting? (Gelphie musings about the feelings of "Want").
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Defiance was Elphaba's strongest trait and one of the things Glinda loved most about her. With Elphaba now gone, however, Glinda can only hope that Elphaba will be defiant one last time and return to her...
Author: lrhaboggle

Description:
Honey just put your sweet lips on my lips

We should just kiss like real people do
Author: number 1 gelphie fanfic fan (Splashy)

Description: neither Glinda nor Fiyero wanted to spend the summer on a small farm out south, but their parents had insisted. Both had been so sure that staying there would be torturous. But maybe, the cute farmhands will make the stay worth it.
Author: MeanGreenThing

Description: so, this is my first fic in a hot minute. i decided to make it just a one shot, as big projects are something i do not have the energy for at this point in time. the writing style in this was very heavily influenced by the the user unknown_knowns (if anyone knows how to tag if that's a thing and stuff please yell at me in the comments), and to be honest, it's working out good. as said in the tags, this was not beta read, so i apologise in advance for any spelling/grammatical errors (some of the grammatical ones are because of style, but hopefully those will be clear). mainly, i made this to get back into the flow of writing and to explore my two absolute favourite girls. i hope you enjoy!
Author: grizzlysnare

Description: Greaser Elphaba and preppy Galinda shouldn't fall for each other, but the heart doesn't always pay attention to what should or shouldn't happen.
Author: TurquoiseDragon
Fanfic_Title: Love Me Tender, Love Me Sweet

Description: A modern AU centred around life at Shiz University. Galinda Upland is cracking under the pressure of maintaining her sophisticated facade. Doesn't she have it all? A doting boyfriend, popularity, parents who want the best for her? Everyone would think she was coping just fine, and she thought she was until she met her roommate, Elphaba Thropp. Elphaba is starting her life over at Shiz, trying to distance herself from her vindictive family and coping with her own problems. Who would think that Elphaba could catch Galinda when she falls and Galinda could soften Elphaba's hard exterior?
Author: TimeDragonClock

Description: Two girls have a life together that is drastically cut short. The universe pities them, giving them another life to love. And another, and another, and another.
Author: Splashy

Description:
Inspired by Hayley Kiyoko's album, Expectations.
---
Elphaba never expected any of this to happen. She never expected to find a chance at love, and to lose it so quickly.
Author: show_me_the_universe

Description: Elphaba is not much for expressing her romantic emotions, so what happens when she writes out her feelings about previous crushes in hopes it'll never be seen? One outgoing, determined little brother may change her last year of high school completely. Inspired by To all The boys I've loved before.
Author: Tiniestgay

Description: For Glinda, hating her job was easy. That is, until one customer showed up and changed everything.
Author: one_short_gay

Description:
Oz is split in two after the Wizard’s departure. Like many others in the Ozian Democratic Republic, Glinda suddenly disappears. Little do people know it was her plan to be captured. 
Because the only way to search for someone who might not even be alive, is to disappear too.
Author: tinyace

Description: What if Glinda did get on Elphaba's broom? This story is a very long answer to a very short question. [Genfic mixed with fluff, Gelphie and more, T+, minor character death, novella]
Author: JessicaX

Description: Elphaba has been in the Resistance for what seems an eternity now, and despite the blood on her hands, she thinks that she is doing the right thing... until she is given orders to assassinate Glinda. Booksical. Gelphie.
Author: the_blue_fairie

Description: Skateboarder AU universe! Basically Elphaba gets hurt while boarding and Glinda panics.
Author: Tiniestgay

Description:
(Inspired by Out of Oz on the farm by GamblingDementor)
Glinda realizes just how amazing her new life with Elphaba is.
Author: show_me_the_universe

Description:
Glinda is gay, thirsty, and takes an art class, but what’s new.
Modern AU. They have phones :)
Author: cofftrop

Description:
The mad green leader of a secret settlement meets a lost helpless girl who has just lost the man who was her protector. It's loathing at first sight − or is it? There's stranger things ever to happen in the wasteland, baby! 
Post-apocalypse AU.
Author: GamblingDementor

Description:
Galinda wakes up from her boring, sophisticated life when she notices the new rebellious girl at school. She immediately falls in true, unadulterated love with her. The only problem is that Elphie isn’t quite as keen on the popular girl showing interest in her. After all, Galinda couldn’t possibly feel that way for a bad seed like her.
Galinda, however, HATES when things don’t go her way. She becomes more and more obsessed with catching Elphie’s attention. What happens next? Stay tuned...
Author: FlyMeToTheM00n

Description:
The world, Elphaba Thropp had decided, was divided into two types of people: those who were good, and those who were clever.And she was not good.

When Elphaba begins falling for Galinda, she must decide if her feelings for her roommate are worth dragging Galinda into the political nightmares of Oz… and what the consequences of falling in love in such a climate could mean for them both.
Author: neednot

Description: Elphaba, a transfer sophomore in college, is quickly thrust into a social life she didn't ask for. As the Thropp Third Descending and the only green student at school, life is hard. Especially when she begins rooming with a certain blonde haired roommate.Glinda, confident with plenty of friends finds herself roped into a love triangle she didn't want to be a part of. Elphaba fills her heart with flurries, but Glinda knows their relationship is one that will not leave the friend zone.Soon though, the two girls find themselves throwing caution to the wind, throwing off the bowlines and sailing into murky waters.
Author: wizomaniac

Description: Elphaba is a skateboarder who hangs out at the skatepark with Fiyero a lot. She's also in a band. Glinda is an Art Major who enjoys drawing out scenes at the park, and is suddenly intrigued by the green girl after her friends take her along to the skatepark one day. Little does she know, Elphaba thinks she's the most beautiful girl she's ever seen. How will their lives connect?
Author: Tiniestgay

Description:
This crazy work is a crossover between She-Ra and the Princesses of Power and the Wicked Series by Gregory Maguire (the books, not the musical). I don't own any of the characters.
The timelines that this story sets in: She-Ra starts at the ends of the episode Promise, with a bit of a twist, and some extra stuff. For Wicked, it starts when Elphaba tells Glinda she will not go back to Shiz, but in this AU, Glinda convinces her to come back. 
A lot of this story involves actual text or words from both She-Ra and the Wicked books, so if you have watched and read, it will be even more fun to read, because I will be literally quoting the characters from time to time. 
 
Actual Summary:Catra is trying to find her way out of the huge temple, after leaving Adora hanging. She cannot seem to find her way out until she finds a lit room and a paper. Something happens and she finds herself in a different world with weird Animals and even weirder people. She has one mission to get out. Will she fulfill it, or chose to stay in Oz?
Author: Garnet_Is_Savage

Description:
When Elphaba avoids home and the tense atmosphere of a long troubled family freshly reunited, she finds solace in the corner's coffee shop her friend Boq works at and as many coffee cups as she can afford. But neither of them ever expected the prissy beautiful rich blonde forced by her parents to step up and get a job to barge into their lives… or her handsome boyfriend who visits the shop every other day. Before they know it, all of them find themselves swooning in ways they never thought they would. But with a reputation to uphold and families to answer to, will love find a way to bloom between two shots of espresso?
Written for NaNoWriMo 2018.
Author: GamblingDementor

Description: High school AU. Nerdy cross country runner Elphaba becomes friends with artsy cheerleader Glinda. Mutual pining and other Soft Things ensue.
Author: GretchenMaurice

Description: What happens after Elphaba's staged death? How will Glinda deal with Elphaba's sudden departure? This is the story of Glinda, ruler of Oz, and how she was driven to insanity.
Author: FlyMeToTheM00n

Description:
'He laughed that sad, hollow laugh once again. And something so familiar about the sound panged at Glinda’s chest. But she couldn’t put her finger on it. She was so close, but so far from figuring out why he seemed so familiar. “Now that I know is not true. You never did pay me much mind, Miss Galinda.”
And it clicked, like a puzzle piece you’ve searched hours for finally fitting into its place.'
Author: MeanGreenThing

Description: Stargazing, wishing, and Gelphie.
Author: TurquoiseDragon
Fanfic_Title: When You Wish Upon A Star

Description: What were The Wicked Witch’s teenage years REALLY like?This is the story of The Witches Of Oz, and this is how it ends.
Author: FlyMeToTheM00n

Description:
“Glinda- do you drink a lot?”
“Only when I miss you.”
“Do you miss me a lot?”
“I think you already know the answer to that, Elphie.”
Author: show_me_the_universe

Description: Galinda and Elphaba and their first day of coexisting in the same space. Elphaba’s inability to pronounce Galinda’s name correctly drives her mad.
Author: FlyMeToTheM00n

Description:
The sun was hotter up here in the desert. Elphaba was happier for it, but Glinda had gotten it into her fretting mind that a whole day under uninterrupted heat couldn't possibly be beneficial. Elphaba loved the sun, but she loved Glinda much more and so every day of extreme heat, she granted Glinda a few hours of her company inside the home after they'd had lunch before heading back out.

Glinda and Elphaba's time alone gets interrupted by a very special new visitor or, the story of how Elphaba digs a pond.
Author: GamblingDementor

Description: Somehow, a cat was in her apartment, and Galinda wasn't sure where it had come from.
Author: TurquoiseDragon

Description: Soulmate AU! Glinda has refused to look at the words written on her shoulder, but soon regrets that decision completely.
Author: Tiniestgay

Description:
"What would 'this' be?""Some kissing, some skin contact. And a few orgasms on either side.”
Or, in which Elphaba is lonely as the Wicked Witch and makes a nighttime visit to Glinda.
Author: JulisCaesar

Description: Post Wicked the musical, some mix of book characters and objects and a slight change of plot. Glinda is ruling Oz after the events of Wicked. She runs it for five years before Dorothy arrives back in Oz, claiming that the Wicked Witch of the West is not only alive, but living in the human world. Little bit of a slow burn. Gelphie and more Gelphie. Little bit of angst.
Author: ezrajclarke

Description:
Galinda meets Elphaba and goes through loathing, self-discovering, love, heartbreak and grief. She wouldn't trade what they had for anything in all Oz.
This story follows the Wicked musical from Glinda's point of view, focused on her relationship with Elphaba and on her personal journey. Each chapter will follow a song/scene or a part of them.
Author: Amanda312

Description: Elphaba and Galinda have another late-night chat about meaningless and philisophical theories. Tonight, it's about faces and identities, and it's all because Galinda wonders what happens when you don't recognize the face you see when you look into a mirror. (Plotless book-verse rambling with minor Gelphie).
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Boq is a dancer, he’s just started attending a dance programme at Shiz. He has no intentions of focusing on anything other than school until he meets a certain boy in his class Sure, he can get a little snippish sometimes, borderlining cruel. But he’s nice most of the time, and everyone has flaws, right?
Author: MeanGreenThing

Description:
Being gay in a tiny town in Kansas is not easy.
Falling in love in a tiny high school is not easy.
Defying the odds in a dead end town is not easy.
But together, it is possible to work through hardships towards the stars.
Author: show_me_the_universe
Fanfic_Title: Per Aspera Ad Astra (Through Hardships Towards the Stars)

Description: Gelphie Harry Potter AU
Author: AAAAAFriday

Description:
Just some gelphie prompts
posting these to make up for me not finishing my highschool au fanfic in time to post it today
Author: Splashy

Description: A slow summer's day is the perfect place and time. Smut.
Author: kuchi

Description:
While attending Shell's wedding in Colwen Grounds, Glinda hears some news that re-ignites some of her old fears.
Elphaba, unaware of the cause of Glinda's sudden melancholy, feels as though her world is crumbling at her feet, a world she'd built with Glinda.
Author: Ohlookitstomorrow

Description:
Glinda had first caught a glimpse of the tall, imposing figure at the ball a week prior, but had lost out on the opportunity to be introduced when her husband had claimed a headache only an hour into the night. She caught sight of the sharp, bird like face, the dark eyes that sat deep into a pale complexion and seemed to Glinda to be always amused or knowing.
Or
Glinda's gay awakening happened ten years too late, and a hundred and fifty years too early.
Author: serenitysolstice

Description: Elphaba can't stop thinking about Glinda
Author: Jestana

Description: Collection of ficlets inspired by Tumblr prompts.
Author: GamblingDementor
Fanfic_Title: Dreams the way we planned them

Description: Elphaba waits for Glinda to come home, but the moment she receives a phone call from Fiyero, everything seems to freeze. Her heart shatters little by little.
Author: Tiniestgay

Description:
Elphaba Thropp is a snarky, introverted nerd. She's also green.
Galinda Upland is a rich, outgoing popular girl.
The two could not be more different, but they're forced to share a room together, and a strange and unique brand of friendship begins to bloom between them.
(The musical, for time's sake, skips over most of the time at Shiz. This story will be filling in the gaps, exploring the development and the intricacies of Elphaba and Galinda's friendship over their years in school.)
EDIT: ON HOLD FOR THE FORESEEABLE FUTURE- please see opening note for more details
Author: show_me_the_universe

Description:
'He and Boq wanted to keep things on the down-low as they had only been dating for about a month. And Fiyero and Boq were the only people in their circle who were known to exclusively like girls. Fiyero knew of Boq’s complicated relationship with his parents, and how they felt about possibly having a gay son. So the two of them had been playing it safe, so his parents wouldn’t find out until he wanted them to.'- excerpt from Chapter Two
heyo, so this story is on a small hiatus, i've been having a lot of writer's block with this, so i'm gonna take a small break from this story while I work on Pas De Deux (another Wicked fic, so you guys still get the content you came to my fics for) hope you all understand ^-^
Author: MeanGreenThing

Description: Galinda and Elphie in the snow. A holiday card collage.
Author: Aruna
Fanfic_Title: Snow With A Wave of A Wand

Description: Glinda wakes up thirty years earlier, as Elphaba is about to leave her in the Emerald City. Bookverse, canon-divergent
Author: chipperdyke

Description:
Glinda gives her a look. 'I’m here now', it says. 'What are you going to do about it?'
She resists every urge to run into the green girl’s arms. They aren’t being offered but she knows—she knows—that they’d catch her if she gave up the stilted pretense of this frosty entrance.
—
They meet again. There's a reckoning of feelings. It's quite gay.
Author: carmilla_unscripted
Fanfic_Title: it well may be (we will never meet again)

Description: It's the last day before Glinda leaves for Lurlinemas, when it finally starts to snow at night...
Author: tinyace

Description:
Hi yes I love gelphie and I love Christmas so why not both???
These are christmas and winter one-shots all inspired by holiday songs!
happy holidays!
Author: show_me_the_universe

Description:
It's one year after Shiz, and everyone is a little... tense. 
Post-Shiz, Wicked Witch era, through Dorothy, melting, and all.
Author: chipperdyke

Description: It is indeed the case that Glinda the Good reads all of her Lurlinemas cards, and this year she'll receive a special one.
Author: all_these_ghosts

Description: Out here in the woods and the dark she has finally come into her wildness.
Author: all_these_ghosts

Description: There are no stories where the princess ends up with the witch.
Author: all_these_ghosts

Description: If Glinda thought too much on it, she became worried her presence was no longer needed for Elphaba's music career. But as Elphaba continued to keep their appointments, whether or not any work was done that day, Glinda let herself enjoy their newly morphed companionship. She liked spending time with Elphaba too much to question whatever it was their dynamic was. For it certainly wasn't simply artist and muse--mortal and goddess--anymore. They were both being entirely too human for that.
Author: KZSD25

Description:
The most unlikely pair at Shiz University find themselves having to share a room in their final year before graduation. But despite trying beginnings, Elphaba and Galinda find friendship in the last place either of them would have guessed. 
A modern college AU, from loathing to loving and everything in between.
Author: kuchi
Fanfic_Title: The Magic You Won't Ever See

Description:
This was originally supposed to be the drabble fill of two prompts, "It won't stop snowing, I guess we’re stuck here until it lets up..." and "Cuddling by the fire." It got… quite a bit longer than you might expect from a drabble.
Anyways, two stuck up dorks alone in a house in the woods, a fire to keep warm, a lot of snow that keeps falling outside, what could possibly go wrong?
Author: GamblingDementor

Description:
25 Gays of Christmas Challenge! I invite everybody to make their own and join in the fun. Just tag 25 Gays of Christmas and I will read, share, and kudos your stories.
Happy Holidays!!
Author: Cassie_Bones

Description: Set during/after the events of For Good."Glinda looked from the Grimmerie to Elphaba. The calculated acceptance of the situation was clear in Elphaba’s eyes. She wasn’t quite defeated, but something only a step above was evident. It was an expression she had only seen once before - right after she had defied the Wizard all those years ago, when she had left Glinda behind. Only this was more definitive. This plan didn’t end with Elphaba soaring into the nighttime sky. This ended with something far worse."
Author: KirraWhiteTigress
Fanfic_Title: The Hardest Part of Losing You

Description:
Galinda and Elphaba are YouTubers. Galinda is well-known for her makeup tutorials. Elphaba is known more for their rants and shockingly green skin. 
They've never had to meet before. So what happens when they do?
Author: Splashy

Description: Elphaba runs into Galinda while going out for coffee. Then she runs into Galinda while getting some fast food. Then when she goes out for pizza. Seriously Galinda? Could you be any less subtle about your infatuation? Though Elphaba isn't very romantic either, since accidently spitting coffee on the girl crushing on you is never in any romance-advice book they sell.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: In a meta moment, the characters review their own musical and banter a bit. (Light, plotless fluff between the characters just because it's high time they all just enjoyed each other's company and got to talk about the musical). Slight reference to Frozen at the end because I'm shameless.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: When Glinda tries to make homework easier by summoning help, she botches the spell and gives herself another task to complete before the start of class tomorrow morning. Luckily, though, despite Glinda's hilarious magical mishap, a certain green girl swoops in to save the day with a spell all her own.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: All her life, Galinda was told never to waste time and energy on thought, but then Elphaba comes along and totally flips the idea on its head. Now, Galinda can't imagine why anyone would ever discourage the art of thought! But then the answer comes to her in time and she finally understands one simple, painful truth.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Trapped in a loveless marriage, Lady Glinda longs for adventure and discovery. Hell-bent on fighting the Wizard on his Animal rights ban, Elphaba Thropp wishes for comfort and security. They couldn't be more different, but can both women find what they desire? Perhaps they may even change Oz in the process...
Author: Ohlookitstomorrow

Description: "Ahben Wingardium Tahkay Leviosa!" Glinda cried, but nothing happened."Do you want me to try?" the green girl asked. "Besides, you're saying it wrong. It's LeviOsa, not LeviosA!"(Just a stupid, semi-crossover where Elphaba takes a page from Hermione Granger's book to help Glinda Weasley).
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: To Chistery, Elphaba is a very confusing creature, happy one moment, angry the next, sad one moment, serene the next, but if there was one trend he did pick up on, it was that most of the things surrounding Elphaba's more passionate moods (good or bad) was always the same thing, a girl by the name of "Glinda".
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: In 3 different scenarios, even after death has parted them, Elphaba will always return to Glinda, even if in a different way each time. (Three-part one-shot, mostly book canon, not continuous).
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Or, the three times Glinda flew with Elphaba on the broom.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: After being bullied into attending the Shiz Prom, Elphaba is left feel irritated and wanting to go home, but for once, life decides to be kind to her and, in exchange for attending the prom, she receives something that makes it all worth while.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: She's in a city of green, but the only color she sees is gold. Golden opportunities, a golden future, and her beautiful golden Glinda.
Author: show_me_the_universe

Description: Elphaba has spent her whole life seeking forgiveness and now, with her latest quest yielding no results after 10 years, she begins to look elsewhere for forgiveness and realizes that although she may need it for most of her life's deeds, maybe there is one that she can cling to as a genuinely good deed. (Book-verse, based off the Abby M. poem "Heaven Above/Below")
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Glinda gave that ugly black hat to Elphaba as a prank. Why, now, does she feel so guilty? And when she tries to apologize, only for her friends to silently threaten to disown her if she does, will Glinda have the bravery to stand up for what (and who) she believes in? It doesn't seem so, but who knows? After all, life could end up changing... (Just the ballroom scene written out).
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: It's finally here; Elphaba's first year at Hogwarts. Their delight and dread are indistinguishable. A whole year of freedom, with libraries to scour and feasts to enjoy and quidditch games and classes and maybe… well, maybe friends.Galinda Arduenna is pureblood, but not like "dark wizards and dark marks" pureblood. More like gilded halls and rich, doting parents and roaring scarlet lions draped around her home of Upland Manor. The Sorting went perfectly, exactly how she wanted, but her parents... well, they’ll come around. Hopefully.
Author: TheSecondQueenOfSol

Description: The charmed circle attend The Ozdust's Halloween festivities in full costume. Some curious outfit choices, shenanigans form Crope and Tibet and perhaps, a little romance...
Author: Ohlookitstomorrow

Description: Boq has dreamt of this moment for far too long but unfortunately, things never seem to go to plan for the Munchkin.
Author: Ohlookitstomorrow

Description: It's based on an OTP prompts I found on Tumblr.Elphie is just doing her laundry and Glinda is bored and helps.And she finds something that Elphaba most certainly didn't want anyone to know. ;)They're both just really, really embarrassed and awkward most of the time lol
Author: Fire_Knight
Fanfic_Title: Wait, hold on! You're not going to make me wear that!"

Description: When one of Glinda's dresses goes missing, one of Elphaba's cloaks turns up. It also makes an appearance in a rather suspicious area. Glinda gets thrown under the bus and something entirely setting-appropriate follows. In short, morning Gelphie shenanigans.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: HSAU but it’s based on a dutch school system so everyone’s on a bike and pep rallies and red cups aren’t a thing. Oh and Elphaba and Glinda fall in a love, obviously.
Author: tinyace

Description:
Elphaba's on the run. Fiyero's moodified. Madame Morrible has Glinda under her thumb, meaning that if Glinda messes anything up, Elphie's screwed. 
Takes place in 'Thank Goodness' from Glinda's POV.
Author: ohmygodbenedictcumberbatch

Description: Elphaba and Glinda are looking to buy a house. Their real estate agent is... confused.
Author: show_me_the_universe
Fanfic_Title: In Which Elphaba and Glinda Buy a House

Description: Elphaba and Glinda were at it again... And the Shiz students loved it! Nothing entertained them more than watching two hot witches going at it. Countless bets were placed and nobody was worried about the fun ever ending because, either way, it seemed that it would last their whole lives long.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: When Glinda asks why Elphaba insists on just dying at the hands of the Witch Hunters instead of trying to escape, Elphaba offers up a very philosophical reply that leaves Glinda with a lot to think about after Elphaba has gone.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description:
A two people's paradise turns out to be less than that. A story of bath tubs, nosy crones, Animals and (re) found family. 
Part of my Farmers AU that Gregory Maguire refused to give us: Elphaba and Glinda ran away from Oz after graduation and became lesbian farmers in an oasis in the desert.
Author: GamblingDementor

Description: Glinda the Good, a recent Shiz graduate, is rising in popularity across Oz. She is loved and respected and popular, and her boyfriend(?) is joining the Royal Guard of Oz. It's a perfect life, it's everything she'd ever wanted... right?
Author: show_me_the_universe

Description: Glinda would start as if from a frightful dream, and then nestle in nearer to Elphaba, who seemed at night never to sleep. In daytimes, however, in the long hours spent in poorly sprung carriages, Elphaba would nod off against Glinda's shoulder.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: When one gets sick, it's the job of the other to play the role of a doctor. (Last fluffy one-shot that's done twice over).
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: When a storm breaks out, someone breaks down. Will the other be able to comfort her? (Fluffy, Gelphie one-shot, second chapter is a role reversal just like with the Nightmare story).
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Simple fluffy one-shot. Glinda has a nightmare and her knight in shining green armor comes to the rescue. (Chap 2 is just the reverse. This time, Elphaba is stricken with a nightmare and it's up to a certain bubbly little blond to bring her back to reality). Can be romantic or platonic.
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: "Then, when that was done, and she had scrubbed the lies from her mind, she took the second blank book, and she lay it open and she took up her pen again, and she wrote the truth."Glinda has told so many lies; some to herself, most to the people of Oz. The truth was locked away in her mind, and now she finds herself desperate to write it down. She needed the truth to be etched in ink, in case the memories ever begin to blur or fade.aka the Wicked Musical canon is an elaborate lie, and Elphaba is out there, somewhere, and Glinda is desperate to have her back.
Author: TheSecondQueenOfSol

Description:
It's been ten years since Dorothy killed the Wicked Witch of the West. Glinda is still picking up the pieces of both her heart and the land of Oz. 
And then, a letter. 
Elphaba might be alive, and Glinda can't help but follow up the information, even if it isn't true. She'd risk life and limb to find the chance that her best friend is alive. 
Ten years is a long time, but some love never truly dies.
Author: sweetoctopodes

Description: When it comes to the Wicked Witch of the West and the people who played parts in her story, the textbooks don't tell everything. Musicalverse, ficlet/oneshot series, various pairings.
Author: candymax

Description:
My Wicked time-travel fix-it Gelphie fic that we all deserve. 
This is Wicked Musicalverse because I've always had such a hard time following the book.Slight Glinda/Fiyero but not really. This is purely Gelphie and does in fact have a happy ending because I'm trash for a happy ending. 
First chapter can be counted as a one-shot but it will be a multi-chapter fic.
Leave feedback and I hope you enjoy!
Author: sax_g0dess

Description: Just two lovely young ladies who are terribly inefficient at having a platonic relationship.
Author: bubb

Description:
Elphaba spent the night awake, but she has plenty of energy for what Glinda offers. 
Somehow started off as PWP, ended up handling a lot of my headcanons on Elphaba's body image issues. Fun times for all.
Author: GamblingDementor

Description: It is rumored that the bell ringer of Notre Dame has skin as green as sin. Isolated from the world Elphaba is content being left alone, until a certain Gillikinese girl enters her life. While a romance slowly unfolds so grows the societal tension within the city’s walls. How long will it take before what’s brewing underneath Emerald City will reach those high towers?
Author: tinyace

Description:
Second installment of my bookverse inspired lesbian farmers AU. 
In which Elphaba and Glinda learn to be more appreciative of each other's work.
Author: GamblingDementor

Description: Galinda is going on a date with Fiyero.Secret relationship Gelphie.Fluff.
Author: BeccaSQ

Description: It's Pride Month, so we've got one story per day about LGBT characters from multiple fandoms including my own original story. Hope you like and have a happy Pride Month!
Author: lrhaboggle

Description: Two times Elphaba went to Emerald City Pride single, and one time she didn't.
Author: zorac

Description:
She smiles and puts on her best face for the citizens. She smiles and puts on her best face for the leaders. She smiles and puts on her best face for the Wizard. She smiles and she puts on her best face and when she gets home at night she tries not to feel quite so hollow.

Glinda learns how to live without the two most important people in her life.
Author: hollyandvice (hiasobi_writes)

Description: Elphaba doesn't like to be interrupted when she's hard at work, but Glinda has other plans.
Author: killingaesthetic

Description:
The Modeling AU no one asked for but is getting. Elphaba is the CEO hiding a secret. Galinda is a rising modelllll who just joined Thropp agency. They meet and things go rocky at first...when they smooth out will the secret tear them apart?
I really suck at summaries...
also ty to a good friend for being my beta for this!
Author: AstronSouls

Description: What happens when four worlds collide through their mysterious and magical libraries? And what does it all mean?
Author: lrhaboggle

Description:
If Gregory Maguire was too cowardly to give us the true ending, which is Elphie and Glinda running away to become lesbian farmers, then I'll have to write that myself. And I just did. 
In which Elphaba escapes a storm and Glinda bakes a pie.
Author: GamblingDementor

Description:
For the past few months of their time at Shiz, she and Elphaba had been like parallel lines, in punishing proximity but on trajectories that would never touch. Now… Galinda didn’t know enough math to decide what they were now. They were one dance, one conversation, one nickname, and one makeover. They were friends. Sort of.
Set after the song Popular (just after Elphaba runs away), the same night of the Ozdust Ballroom party.
Author: LieutenantSaavik

Description: “I loved her first.”
Author: all_these_ghosts

Description: it's a fleshing out of book canon and the aspects of the two girls' relationship that doesn't get explored too explicitly in the novel. slow burn but definitely heading for gelphie romance. it will be angsty bc i love suffering but there will be soft fluff too i promise.
Author: glindasgay (rootcoding)
Fanfic_Title: Two Roads Diverged in a Wood

Description: Shiz era, Glinda and Elphaba sharing an intimate moment in the dark of the night. Set during the short time period before the Emerald City.
Author: GamblingDementor

Description: Bookverse. What would have happened had Elphaba's plan to elope to the Emerald City had failed due to interference? Follow the course of her life, her relationship with Glinda, and the rest of the Charmed Circle through their final years at Shiz and beyond into young adulthood. Gelphie hot and heavy starting in chapter 2. Rated M for sexual situations and violence.
Author: lightningprince

Description: Follow up to Her Weakness.  Galinda and Elphaba grow closer but Galinda faces one last test.  Is her new love and new found self-confidence strong enough to endure it?
Author: KJMusings

Description:
Something that I made for a prompt, "Gelphie, but with your favorite Worst Witch quote."
Elphaba reflects on her feelings for Glinda during her final moments.
Author: RainBowSasaFras
Fanfic_Title: A Witch Makes Things Go Her Way

Description: Galinda, belonging to a dying race of witches, has to leave her home and everything she held dear to her to learn the old ways and traditions of her kind from a mysterious being with fantastic powers. Unknowing of what the future holds Galinda's expectations and knowledge of the world around her will change as she learns about who and what she might become.But at what cost?
Author: Curious
Fanfic_Title: What the Future Holds for Us

Description: Multifandom collection, semi-request based, short one-shots about various femslash ships I love
Author: WaterHorseyBlues

Description:
They migrate between beds like some sort of strange, three-bodied alien, always pressed together in tangled limbs and huffed laughter and gentle teasing. It works, somehow, and days turn into weeks turn into months, and for the first time ever, Elphaba thinks--hopes--suspects--she might not be alone
OR
None of them were supposed to interact at Shiz. They should've been separate, should never have even crossed paths, really, but they did and they can't change that and to be honest, they wouldn't do it even if they could. What they have is too good to be stopped by little things like society.
Author: Chill_with_Penguins

Description: Schoolgirls fall in love with other schoolgirls all of the time. Elphaba curses herself for allowing it to be the girliest schoolgirl of the whole lot.
Author: Val_Creative

Description: Galinda is upset, Elphaba tries to comfort her.Generic Gelphie fluff
Author: BeccaSQ

Description: Glinda has become an expert at navigating Elphaba's stubbornness towards socialization.
Author: Mustachebabs

Description: Dicono che per crescere come artista devi crescere come persona. Glinda non sa se questo sia vero oppure no, ma sa che quando sei vicina a Elphaba non puoi fare altro se non crescere, almeno per stare al suo passo.
Author: Mikirise
Fanfic_Title: Chiudi gli occhi e guardati intorno

Description: As she watches Elphaba dancing alone at Oz Dust, Galinda is wracked with guilt and is determined to make it right.
Author: KJMusings

Description:
Galinda Upland has it all, wealth, good looks and social status. Her final year of high school was meant to be a walk in the park. That was until someone decided to throw a wrench in her plans in the form of Elphaba Thropp, a new student enrolled via scholarship. 
Elphaba is an intelligent, yet jaded and gruff young woman with an abusive past, who just wants to finish high school without too much trouble from her peers. 
Though at first the two young woman loathe one another, circumstances eventually cause them to wind up living together! Follow their trials and tribulations as both young woman discover more about the other, and in the process they form a friendship that begins to grow into something more.
Author: iamgoku

Description: Elphaba is a bike riding butch escaping their old life by moving to Shiz. Glinda is a mysterious, intimidatingly hot femme that gets right under their skin, and draws them into her world.
Author: Wagyubeefy

Description: Elphaba and Galinda are inside on a snowy day. It's rather cold outside and the atmosphere gives Elphaba confidence that she didn't know she had.
Author: starspangledmeatball

Description: "The new girl was green. It wasn't an ugly color; on the contrary, Galinda thought it was a very nice shade of green. It just wasn't natural." Galinda Upland is, against her will, intrigued by her newest suitemate and the mystery that is Elphaba Thropp. She just doesn't yet realize that Elphaba finds her just as intriguing.
Author: wickedspeed

Description:
Galinda is very quickly becoming addicted to the way Elphaba brightens every time Galinda speaks her mind, looking at her as if her opinions and thoughts are important. Elphaba is very quickly becoming addicted to the way Galinda doesn't hesitate over the prickly attitude or green skin, looking at her as if she is worthy of affection.
Shiz is a long way from home, and with no one else who quite understands the green girl and the blonde sorceress the way the other does, it's so simple to cling to each other, even amid horrible headmistresses and Arjiki princes and midterms.
 A mix of book and musical verse AU of their days at dear old Shiz.
Author: echoes_of_realities

Description: Elphaba Thropp never stays with one person for long.  She is as unattainable as the moon, in Galinda's opinion.  Surely she knows better than to fall for her aloof roommate.  Or does she?
Author: Lunas_Secret_Lover

Description: Glinda has a job interview at a big bank, but somehow luck simply doesn't seem to be on her side. Although she doesn't get the job, the consequences of this one short interview turn out to be more far-reaching than she could possibly have imagined. Modern AU. Gelphie.
Author: MyLittleElphie

Description: AU: Elphaba knows that she'll never be able to have Galinda the way that she wants her because she's with Fiyero and she'll never see her as more than a friend until one night the socialite comes home with her dress ripped. Galinda won't tell her what happen but the bookworm has a clear idea and makes sure that she's protected but will this change things between them? Intersex Elphaba
Author: FantasyNinja

Description: The train ride to the Emerald City creates a liminal space for Glinda and Elphaba to explore what might be.
Author: nobinaries

Description: Galinda is the heiress to the illustrious Arduenna Clan and undisputed queen of Crage Hall's College for Young Ladies. Elphaba, better known as Fae, is a reclusive performance artist and queerpunk urban legend. When they begin to collide, their worlds are left changed forever, and not all necessarily for the better.
Author: Wagyubeefy

Description: Galinda takes Elphie shopping.
Author: nobinaries

Description: What happens between the songs?
Author: nobinaries

Description:
Elphaba has been on the run for nearly thirty years when she finally works up the courage to return to Oz, to return to Glinda. But three decades is a long time, and Elphaba worries that Glinda might have forgotten her in all that time.
The truth is far more devastating.
Author: echoes_of_realities
Fanfic_Title: Goodness Knows, the Wicked Die Alone

Description: Her decision was selfless and strong and everything she always was that you never were, and yours was thoughtless and selfish and so much less than she deserved.
Author: rowaninja

Description: One-Shot. Set after 'The Interview' but can also be treated as stand alone, I suppose :)
Author: MyLittleElphie

Description: IKEA opens in Oz and Glinda insists Elphaba should redecorate her dingy lodgings. Will Elphaba choose a Karlstad sofa or the Anita curtains in anything other than pink? Or just get no further than the restaurant?
Author: Terfle

Description: Carmilla and Laura go to the theater and sometimes even professional actresses make mistakes.
Author: Secretlygay
Fanfic_Title: That doesn't soften the ache we feel When reality sets back in

Description: Musicalverse. Glinda, after a lifetime of bad choices, orchestrates a coup to tempt Elphaba out of hiding.
Author: Rysler

Description: Elphaba swoops in for a booty-call. It's bookverse, so there's also angst.
Author: Rysler

Description: Musicalverse. Slight AU in that Glinda shows up at Kiamo Ko before the events of "Wonderful" fuck everything up for everybody.
Author: Rysler

Description: Elphaba falls off her broom.
Author: Rysler
Fanfic_Title: The Birds That Wanton In the Air

Description: He'd made the wrong choice. As soon as Galinda danced with her, in front of everyone, he saw it. Everyone was open to stare and fawn over Elphaba--exactly what they'd been doing in veiled spying on her in class, their faces pinched with envy whenever the professors courted her. For the first time in four schools, he'd chosen the wrong girl.
Author: Rysler
Fanfic_Title: She's Just Not That Into You

Description: there is much that can be learned by watching what is unspoken.
Author: nobinaries

Description: When visiting the Ozling Brother's Circus, a blonde woman and a prince come across the main attraction, a mysterious woman with green skin that burns when water comes in contact with it. After stealing the girl away from the circus and hiding her in their home, both Glinda and Fiyero slowly fall in love with the circus woman, causing immense problems and conflicts along the way.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description:
I know I'm way late to jump on this bandwagon but I'm so obsessed that I can't help but want to just write one-shots and AUs and UGH I have so many ideas! I'm super excited to write AUs and One-shots.
Rated for language and adult themes.
Not really book-verse but not really Musical-verse either. A general blend from my knowledge of it all I guess you could say. Things like Nessa's disabilities and things will probably vary between one-shots
Author: Whomp_Whomp

Description:
Galinda's drunk kiss leaves Elphaba scared - and elated.
JESUS I can't write summaries.
Author: IDontLikeGrapes

Description: Galinda has a lot on her mind as she attends Madam Morrible's birthday soiree.
Author: nobinaries

Description: A fluffy gelphie Shiz-era ficlet inspired by a wonderful Out of Oz book quote.
Author: tinyace

Description: Something has changed and Elphaba knows she must go back to Oz regardless of the danger.
Author: nobinaries

Description:
Glinda has a secret she's been hiding for years, a secret kink that she's hidden from everyone. One that her roommate, Elphaba, is only making worse by unknowingly driving Glinda crazy with lustful urges. 
One night however, Glinda decides to sieze her chance while she has some privacy. But is this a good idea? and will this possibly lead to something more between the blond and the green girl?
Author: iamgoku
Fanfic_Title: The secret kinks of Ms Glinda Upland

Description: Galinda and Elphaba have a drunk one night stand, leaving Galinda desperate for more.
Author: IDontLikeGrapes

Description: It’s a cold winter night, her roommate is shivering, and Galinda can’t sleep. Fluff ensues.
Author: papergardener
Fanfic_Title: Get Over Here and Sleep With Me

Description: When Glinda hears the 'good' news of the untimely death of the Wicked Witch of the West, Elphaba, Elphie ... her Elphie ... she just breaks apart. Shattering on the floor like a porcelain doll.
Author: EmeraldFondue

Description: Gelphie in a But I'm A Cheerleader AU. Galinda as Megan, Elphaba as Graham. I'll revise this summary later...Later on there'll be more of a tw for homophobia but right now it's not too bad (just a couple uses of h*m*sexual and h*m*).NOTE: as of this first chapter it's just Galinda, don't get your hopes up for any other characters yet lol
Author: harveytheaxwieldinglesbianadventurer

Description: Glinda's determined to give Elphaba a funeral, even if she's the only attendee.
Author: ViolaWay
Fanfic_Title: knowing that your life was my life's best part

Description: A series of random one-shots with pretty cliche fanfic themes. Some more platonic, but most romantic in nature.
Author: wimol

Description: Elphaba didn't find people in relationships cute. She just happened to have a crush on her roommate and her roommate's boyfriend. Nothing major.
Author: whichlights

Description:
Elphaba and Galinda know they can reach out to one another for support.
[Day 19 of Pride Month fic challenge.]
Author: mizzshy

Description: Elphaba isn't one to put off her schoolwork until the last minute. Unfortunately, the same can't be said for her roommate. But if it results in more time spent together... being recruited as the party girl's study helper might not be so bad.
Author: kittywithakeyboard

Description:
In the Emerald City, the streets are dangerous, and Galinda finds herself in need of rescue. Biker AU.
[Day 5 of Pride Month fic challenge.]
Author: mizzshy

Description: Old, imported. To the tune of 'locked out at night time' with a hint of Lurlinemas.
Author: Cheloya

Description: After Elphaba's departure from the Emerald City Glinda finds her in an old abandoned shack. There is a downpour and they have to spend the night together. In the light of the fire feelings are revealed.
Author: TheBadIdeaBears

Description: Boq gets a scholarship to the prestigious Boarding School, Shiz High. In a desperate attempt to make friends and get closer to his roommate, he joins the Debate Team.
Author: orphan_account

Description: In the dark, her skin looked different. Fluid, alive, like a coiled dragon, tinted a dark shade of olive.
Author: ardvari

Description: Somewhere along the last stretch of road she had chipped a nail. She picked at the pink polish, wondering when she’d have time to fix her nails again, when she’d have time to do her hair. For the past two days they’d been traveling in carriages, spending their nights on lumpy mattresses, wrapped in their cloaks.
Author: ardvari

Description: Takes place during the song “For Good,” the thoughts running through Elphaba’s head as she realizes she must go to her doom are merely flashbacks of her love affair with Glinda the Good.
Author: fromthechaos
Fanfic_Title: The Story of How Hard We Tried

Description:
"I finally looked up and met her eyes, abandonating my pride and better judgement, and I was startled to find that they were actually quite lovely. They were rich brown, like fresh soil in Springtime right after it has just rained, and they were flecked with an earthy green color.
I realized that I could really make them pop with some gold eyeshadow."
Or, a year in the life of Galinda Upland and her her (wicked or wonderful) roomate, Elphaba Thropp, at Shiz University.
Author: hmltngrl

Description: Sequel to Survival. When Elphaba leaves Shiz, both girls face the consequences. For Elphaba, that means falling deeper into Oz’s growing political mess. For Glinda, it’s resisting Morrible’s control. Neither is sure they’ll succeed, but they keep fighting anyway—for Oz, for their friends, for each other.
Author: GretchenMaurice

Description: Galinda wants variety in her life--a change. A new girlfriend, a new friend...something. What she doesn't expect to find is a new partner in Elphabang DeepThropp, a lewd, asshole-ish drag king at the new lesbian bar downtown. She doesn't know that Elphabang is actually Elphaba, nonbinary, and awkwardly sweet in the best of ways...but she will. She will.
Author: toastweasel

Description: Companion Piece to No One is Alone and Safe and Sound. Can be read as a one shot. A year after they overthrow the Wizard. Elphaba is finally getting her wish to make good for all of Oz. But is it really her dream come true? Gelphie. Inspired by Keep Your Eyes Open by Taylor Swift.
Author: FaerieTales4ever

Description:
It's Valentine's Day, and Elphaba can't wait for it to be over. However, can Glinda make it an amazing day for both of them? Who does she give her valentine to?
Childhood fluff. GELPHIE FRIENDSHIP AU. Valentine's Day ONE-SHOT. Booksical. I don't own Wicked. Please review!
Author: thewickedverkaiking

Description: Elphaba out paces Glinda to the sight of Nessa's passing and she and Dorothy meet in a very different manner. Canon compliant with the musical before 'As Long as Your Mine.'
Author: RhinoMouse

Description: Glinda decides she likes Elphie like this. Bound and blind and completely at her mercy.
Author: JuniorWoofles

Description: (Fluff)Galinda takes the attention off Elphie with a slightly humilating dance.
Author: Hedwigandtheangrybitch
Fanfic_Title: Dancing Through Life, Dancing Through Love

Description: Just some short Gelphie smut for you all.
Author: neednot

Description: When Galinda Upland joined The Lavender Gym, a gym for women and Queer individuals, she was not expecting to find love. And then Elphaba Thropp stepped into the weight room... AU.
Author: toastweasel

Description: Instead of joining the Resistance or directly rebelling against The Wizard, Elphaba Thropp is caught studying and crafting pocket universes and is brought to court, under the assertion that the way she is using her magical talents could pose a threat for all of Oz. In her cell, as she awaits a guaranteed death sentence, she reminisces about her time at Shiz University, from her arrival to the events that led her to her current situation.
Author: SapphicMetatron

Description:
Glinda is decorating the dorm room for Lurlinemas, and Elphaba, who has never celebrated Lurlinemas before, is rather unenthusiastic about it, especially when Glinda forces her to help. Some things don't really go as planned. 
ONESHOT. Gelphie friendship fluff. Bookverse. My first Wicked fanfiction. I do not own the characters. Please review!
Author: thewickedverkaiking

Description: As Elphaba contemplates the lack of touch in her life, it surprises her to discover who exactly she wants to be tactile with.
Author: Mbarduk

Description:
One night at Shiz, Elphaba comes back to her room only to acidentally stumble upon Glinda in a rather compromising position, and learns a secret about the blonde that she has hidden from everyone. Will this drive the two apart? Or bring them closer together than ever before. 
Gelphie Rated M for mature content, and Glinda's 'secret'
Crossposted on FF.Net
Author: iamgoku

Description:
This is an extremely niche AU I wrote Wicked into based on the Natasha, Pierre, and the Comet of 1812 musical.
If you're somehow a fan of both of those things, I think you'll like this. If you have no idea what the musical is about, this is sort of similar to a Aristocrats/War and Peace/Opera AU.
Author: Mustachebabs

Description:
‘Of all the people to be stranded on a desert island with, why in the name of Oz did it have to beyou?!’
When a spell goes awry, Galinda and Elphaba find themselves trapped on an island far away from anything they've ever known. Will they be able to find their way home? And will they manage to get along with each other long enough to do so?
Author: elphiethropp

Description: Elphaba’s known for a while. Galinda, however, is just figuring it out.
Author: orphan_account

Description: Just some good ol' gelphie fluff. Modern AU and cute college domestic. Technically in the same universe as Put a Spell on You (only a year later), but that's not really relevant at all.
Author: GretchenMaurice

Description: Cronan was always told that she would never be adopted. Families were warned against adopting her, but when Elphaba and Glinda decide it's time for them to have a child and choose adoption as the method, Cronan just might find she's not as hopeless as she always thought.
Author: fishstic

Description:
"I'm Avaric Tenmeadows, your new roommate. And you are?"
Fiyero had been completely sure he wasn't expecting a roommate, not after what his father told the administration at Shiz. But this Avaric person- who had been lying on one of the beds with a tank top clinging too tight to his torso and skinny jeans slipping below his hips- makes Fiyero's cheeks burn in ways he's never really felt.
Author: MyVisionIsDying

Description:
"Thanks, Elphie," Glinda said with a small smile. "You can have some of my candy if you want."
"You? Share candy? I doubt that," Elphaba chuckled.
Glinda gasped in mock horror. "Are you suggesting that I, the magnificent Glinda Upland would lie?"
"You, lie? Never," Elphaba replied sarcastically. "I must have mistaken you for someone else."
Author: fishstic

Description: Elphaba Thropp is Shiz University's most talented artist who could quote anime or sci-fi word for word. Glinda Upland is Shiz University's best ballet dancer with a sweet-natured personality that could make people go weak at the knees. Together, they could rule the stage… or the world. Either choice is good.
Author: MyVisionIsDying
Fanfic_Title: Love: Studying the Art of its Dance.

Description: Galinda moves into a new apartment with an old friend and four strangers. All of them are interesting, but none more than her new roommate; green, angry, and the future Eminent Thropp.
Author: Wagyubeefy

Description:
The alphabet, according to the Thropp sisters at least.
or: 26 one shots about the thropp sisters, alphabetized for your convenience. each chapter has its own summary with a list of characters, ships, and warnings.
Author: culo
Fanfic_Title: Animals and Boq and Chairs, Oh My

Description: Elphaba gets bullied and Glinda helps her and reveals her feelings.
Author: mehsarah

Description:
Denying Gravity may be Wicked. Denying Reality? Wicked Awesome!*
 
*Others may be inclined to disagree.
Author: fleurrochard

Description: Imagine the Wicked characters having sex dreams about each other... Fourshot, based on the three main characters.
Author: aphleser

Description: Elphaba Thropp has many in her thrall, many under her spell. Shall we explore those various smitten individuals? Yes, we shall. Four-shot. Fiyeraba, Gelphie, Elphaboq and Elpharic all included.
Author: aphleser

Description: Elphaba just doesn't comprehend how Galinda has managed to fall for her, of all people. Galinda spends some time enlightening her. Shameless fluff.
Author: aphleser
Fanfic_Title: I Don't Deserve You At All

Description: Galinda is very interested in Elphaba's glasses, and wishes to know everything about them, maybe even try them on... Gelphie fluff, Shiz-Era, before Nessa comes to the University.
Author: aphleser

Description: Modern AU, Shiz-era. Roomates Elphaba and Galinda meet at a university party, and get to know each other a little better... Rated M for swearing and sexual hints.
Author: aphleser

Description: The Charmed Circle play a little game of Spin the Bottle. How will each character react to a touch of kissing? Shiz-era, bookverse, Gelphie.
Author: aphleser
Fanfic_Title: Ask Me No Questions, And I'll Spell You No Lies

Description: (High School AU) After three years of fighting, Galinda decides she's had enough, and wants to be friends with unfortunate loner Elphaba Thropp. However, will this decision be worth the price?
Author: Alice_Writes_Stuff

Description: The numbers on her forearm tick down in steady beats. But it happens in an instant, during a road accident when it's fourteen hours, twenty one minutes and thirty seconds until Glinda meets her soulmate. She doesn't notice the numbers plummet before they disappear, not until it's too late.
Author: MyVisionIsDying
Fanfic_Title: The Numbers Countdown Only For You

Description: Glinda and Elphaba are alive, in love, growing old together. Though it was hardly easy to manage. Bookverse canon divergence.
Author: Wagyubeefy

Description: This is a multi-fandom crossovers of all my favorite shows and the characters I feel comfortable writing. I've sorted them each into the houses I believe they would be sorted into by the Sorting Hat itself. I understand if you don't agree with my choices, but I hope you enjoy the story nonetheless.
Author: Cassie_Bones

Description: three one word prompt fills. different fandoms. different ships.
Author: entangledbanks (summerhurleys)

Description: Elphaba tries to study; Glinda tries to distract her.
Author: fairchristabel
Fanfic_Title: There's a First Time for Everything

Description: Glinda and Elphaba don't do presents, even on birthdays. Usually.
Author: Wagyubeefy

Description: Amidst the forest she walks in the never-ending darkness. Long ago she cursed herself into a deep sleep for eternity. Blind and alone, she wanders aimlessly through the gnarled tree trunks and their swaying branches, through the pricking thorns of the plants waiting for her friends to come, waiting for them to wake her up. But until then Glinda walks...
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: Una serie de pensamientos (casi)inconexos de la señorita Galinda mientras observa a su extraordinaria (y verdosa) compañera de piso.
Author: JudasCasiBlanco

Description: Post-musical sad Glinda. Sad Elphaba as an extra bonus. Considerable book influence. Inspired by comments on GretchenMaurice's "Stay Gold."
Author: regenderate

Description: A starry night. A glowing fire. A few drinks. A few questions. A circle of friends.
Author: GretchenMaurice

Description: Glinda volunteers for glory. Elphaba volunteers for her sister. It only makes sense for Elphaba to kill Glinda on sight when she gets the chance. So what does it mean when she lets the blonde go instead? Hunger Games AU. Gelphie.
Author: GretchenMaurice

Description:
I don't remember where this idea came from, but I was talking to my friend about how Galinda should kiss Elphaba after Popular and that's why Elphaba has to go. So. If this was your idea, please do tell me. If this fic already exists, especially tell me. (I want to read it.) This is musicalverse, although strong book influence on Elphaba's character.
I'm not going to put actual song lyrics in this. I don't like trying to integrate them into prose.
Author: regenderate
Fanfic_Title: Little Ways to Flirt and Flounce

Description: When Glinda calls at 3:30 AM asking for a ride home... well. It's not like Elphaba's going to turn her down.
Author: ProfessorSpork

Description:
“Lady Glinda had a bad night, a night of shakes and regret and pain; she guessed it was the early signs of gout from her rich diet. But she sat up half the night and lit a candle in a window, for reasons she couldn't articulate. The moon passed overhead in its path from the Vinkus, and she felt its accusatory spotlight, and moved back from the tall windows” (Wicked 404).
Or: In the aftermath of the Witch's death, Lady Glinda takes to sleepwalking.
Author: biextroverts

Description: After failing her examination to become a doctor, Elphaba soon finds herself battling a number of obstacles that include a deadly disease on the rampage, her fiance's secretive job as Captain of The Guard, her best friend falling in love with her, and an accusation that could destroy her life forever. Based off of NBC's Dracula. Victorian Era.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: another trash au by meInspired by a post by theboofastgenie on Tumblr; Elphaba and Galinda are roommates at an elite boarding school. Starts in ninth grade as measured by American schools because that's what I know.
Author: regenderate

Description: Out Of Oz fanfiction. I found a quote from Wicked in it, and wrote this. Based on Rain's time with Lady Glinda.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble
Fanfic_Title: Don't Wish, Don't Start, Wishing Only...

Description: A whole bunch of little moments, not necessarily in any order because I used those special parts to make my robot girlfriend.
Author: ravensblades

Description: Elphaba Thropp could not hate her new roomate anymore than she already does, the way she always smells sickeningly sweet like a field of flowers, how her golden hair and blue eyes make her look like she walked out of some disney movie or dumb romantic comedy, and most of all she hates those dumb pink panties.
Author: itsbroadwaybaby

Description: Gelphie. Elphaba learns she should pay closer attention.
Author: ravensblades

Description: Snow White refuses to educate Emma in magic when her seventeen-year-old daughter has learnt the true meaning of what Dark Magic can do. Being declined to be taught to use her powers Emma seeks help from the person her mother hates the most Regina Mills, the Evil Queen. TW: Mentions of rape, self-harm and suicide
Author: VriskaFanGirl

Description: Chapters, scenes, and snippets from plot bunnies too bothersome to ignore. From a number of different fandoms, this is a collection of things written, many pieces from larger stories that may or may not ever be finished. Rating and tags will be modified as we go.
Author: QuickWit

Description: “Lady Glinda had a bad night, a night of shakes and regret and pain: she guessed it was the early signs of gout from her rich diet. But she sat up half the night and lit a candle in a window, for reasons she couldn't articulate.”Here's my take on that night.
Author: wamblytomato

Description: "How many times must I tell you that I have no heart, my dear Elphaba?" Glinda gazed upon the green woman sadly, "I mean, I have a heart that beats and keeps me alive, yes. But a heart that loves," the blonde shook her head, "I wasn't blessed with such a precious treasure. I wasn't designed with such a heart." Based off of Great Expectations by Charles Dickens.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: This is an archive of all of the things I've written on tumblr, as I am remaking my blog and don't want to lose everything.
Author: NotQuiteHumanAnymore

Description: She felt as though she were Morrible's puppet, the Wizard's toy and that there was no way out of it... and this dress, this beautiful, magnificent dress was just another trap for her, another cage for her to be confined in. A one shot about Glinda and her wardrobe. Gelphie.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: We miss our loved ones most when we are not with them on New Year's Eve.
Author: reginasmills

Description: It's Graduation Day for Glinda, Avaric, Boq, and Crope, but only one thing is on Glinda's mind.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: Elphaba looked at the blonde like she had already figured this out. "Oh my sweet, my hopelessly hopeful sweet, you really thought that you could bring me back, didn't you?" Elphaba gave Glinda one of those rare smirks that she loved, "No one can be brought back from the dead darling, not even by magic." A Halloween One Shot. Post Musical but more bookverse.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description:
youtuber au because why not? vaguely based on this post: http://otpprompts.tumblr.com/post/133681922969/person-a-and-person-b-of-your-otp-are-youtubers 
Galinda is a fashion vlogger and Elphaba is a social justice vlogger and no one quite knows how they became friends
Author: orphan_account

Description: After Elphaba fails to kill Madame Morrible and Fiyero is murdered, she turns to the one person that she vowed would never be a part of this mess. What happens when she reunites with Glinda. It's based on this post that I made on Tumblr. (http://halerazer.tumblr.com/post/129777189658/gelphie-plot-bunny-cuz-im-stuck-at-work-and-cant)
Author: evilregal07

Description: Two years after Elphaba and Fiyero's deaths, Glinda is now ruling Oz with the help of her husband Chuffrey. When a criminal escapes and rumors are being spread about a certain Witch and Scarecrow being back, how will Glinda handle all of this? Booksical.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: Galinda accompanies Elphaba to the library for the first time and they both end up learning more about themselves than they ever expected to. Fluffy Gelphie one shot.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: "Everyone is a slave to their own emotions dear," Chuffrey said with a laugh, "But you, you are a slave to her. A slave through and through to that woman, the Wicked Witch of the West." On the eve of Elphaba's death, Glinda and Chuffrey discuss each other's loyalties. One shot.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: "I can't deal with this anymore, not with Oz, not with Chuffrey, not with this guilt," whispered Glinda to herself as she began to cry silent tears. Though no one else was in the station she felt as if a million eyes were staring at her, hating her, and waiting for her to decide. Suddenly Glinda heard the noise of another train coming, and she smiled to herself. A angsty one shot.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: "Are none of the boys here good enough for you, little miss Galinda?" taunted Pfannee when the other girls had taken up another cup of tea, "Maybe you'd rather take up a relationship with that roommate of yours if you refuse to copulate or date any of the fine looking men here. I mean, if that's what you like…." Galinda evaluates her relationship with Elphaba after a luncheon.
Author: ComingandGoingByBubble

Description: “Do you have any plans this Saturday?”“Hm…Saturday. That’s the 31st, right?”“I believe so.”“I don’t know. I’ll have to check my schedule. What did you have in mind?”“I guess you’ll just have to find out.”
Author: GretchenMaurice

Description: Those millions of little wings take flight now, making my whole body tingle.
Author: A Magiluna Stormwriter (ariestess)
Fanfic_Title: millions of little wings take flight

Description:
Or, "Saints are not always the greatest men".
