There was no choice but escape. The Wizard ensured that. But Elphaba had never allowed anyone to dictate her choices, and she would not start now.
Author: Fruipit

Description: In which, Fiyero has difficulty talking to women, so Galinda is his wing woman. He finds Elphaba attractive, but Elphaba is more interested in Galinda. I got this idea when I found out that a friend of mine is ridiculously shy about talking to girls. One-shot, for now. As usual, if there's interest, I'd consider continuing it.
Author: evilregal07

Description: So this is an idea that I got based on some of the passages in the book, such as, Elphaba's discussion with Fiyero about her virginity (or rather, lack thereof) and that night on the road to the Emerald City with Glinda, but it's musical verse in that Glinda and Fiyero are dating in the dreams/flashbacks.
Author: evilregal07

Description: Glinda reunites with Elphaba after nearly twenty years since her watery demise at Kiamo Ko. *Spoiler for Out of Oz, fluff/angst*
Author: MaplePucks

Description: Elphaba and Galinda haven't seen each other for a year. This is their reunion and what happens after, told in quick snapshots from alternating perspectives. (Modern AU)
Author: regenderate

Description: For 16 years Elphaba and Glinda have lived together in harmony, neither taking more than the other can give nor giving more than the other can take, but all that changed when Fiyero came over to ask about a rumor that turned out to be true. Now Elphaba's life gets turned on its head and it's all she can do to keep from drowning in the sea of things that are suddenly going wrong --or right, depending on who is being asked.
Author: fishstic

Description: Yet another prompt from Tumblr: "Please don't leave me" this time in Gelphie form, and I suck at drabble. I don't think I've ever done it and if I ever do... someone let me know because I'm at a loss. I did like this one. I would multi-fic this but probably in a different life where I had less anxiety about completing something. Anyhow - I hope you all enjoy.Reviews make me smile. You are loved.
Author: EponineFaye

Description: Prompt from Tumblr: "I was flirting with you" and I had fun with this one. Galinda and Elphaba in shiz-era and they're just doing them. Super cute. Short-ish.Reviews make me smile. You are loved.
Author: EponineFaye

Description: Elphaba just wants to live her dream of studying at Shiz. Galinda just wants to be the most beloved girl at the school. Meanwhile, terrible things are happening in Oz, starting with the Animals. Their lives are about to change, but how are the girls going to deal with the rest of the world if they can't even survive each other? Eventual Gelphie.
Author: GretchenMaurice

Description: Based on a prompt given to me by tap-Violeta and the movie This Means War. Galinda and Fiyero are both falling for Elphaba, so they decide to each take her out let her choose who she’d rather date. But none of the dates go as planned thanks to the jealousy that love can bring out. Who do you think will win?
Author: FaerieTales4ever

Description: Your daemon symbolizes your soul. Since Elphaba Thropp doesn’t have a soul, of course she doesn’t have a daemon either.
Author: JulisCaesar

Description: Bookverse. Glinda's denial of Elphaba's death, basically. Major spoilers if you haven't read the book. (But also-- go read the book! It's worth it)
Author: regenderate

Description: ouat + wicked= this fic¡¡¡ enjoy.
Author: pbb

Description: What if Galinda decided to go with Elphaba during defying gravity?
Author: justadarksoul

Description: It's Galinda's wedding day, and time is running out in her search for Elphaba.
Author: Mbarduk

Description: Lady Glinda, on the night of the Wicked Witch's death. Inspired by a passage near the end of the book. (Moved over from my ff.net account)
Author: GretchenMaurice

Description: It is the 51st Annual Grand Ozian Ball, and Elphaba has not been invited.
Author: girlfangs (orphan_account)
Fanfic_Title: The Art of Dancing While Hidden

Description: Just a quick Gelphie drabble.
Author: theWickedWitchofFeels

Description: Returning to a ship I haven't written for in ages, Gelphie, for a post-Finale thing.
Author: theWickedWitchofFeels

Description: Companion Piece to No One is Alone. Two weeks after they overthrow the Wizard. Galinda wakes up to Elphaba screaming and thrashing in their bed, haunted by ghosts of the past. Gelphie. Inspired by Safe and Sound by Taylor Swift.
Author: FaerieTales4ever

Description: And this is all wrong, and not at all the way she imagined it, but it seems to fit, nevertheless.
Author: halwen
Fanfic_Title: In Which Glinda Joins Elphaba and Fiyero in Bed

Description: Vague 50's Oz au. Galinda is scared of people finding out she's gay. Elphaba is scared of being burned alive by her peers. They fall in love, and its awful.
Author: Wagyubeefy

Description: Think of what we can do… together.
Author: A Magiluna Stormwriter (ariestess)

Description: A completely insane idea that's been bouncing around in my head for a few months and I finally put it into writing. If the tags aren't enough to pique your interest, nothing I put here will.
Author: BandraK

Description: Glinda's walk home didn't turn out quite like expected.
Author: fishstic

Description: Frex was appalled when Elphaba got her Hogwarts letter, why wouldn't he be, he made his living preaching about how evil magic was. But he didn't see the harm in letting her go to Hogwarts, it's what Melena would have wanted. After being abandoned at King's Cross, 11yo Elphaba learns that maybe there's more to Hogwarts than just a school of magic, and perhaps there's more to the world of magic than anyone is willing to tell her.
Author: fishstic
Fanfic_Title: Eagle Wings and Snake Fangs: Year of the Green Girl

Description: Glinda’s eyes darted around their dorm room in search of something, anything, to do.
Author: orphan_account

Description: Galinda rolled over in her bed with a moan, clutching her pillow to her belly. She whimpered pitifully as her stomach gave another growl of protest. Surely her new diet wasn't as bad as all this.
Author: Crookykanks

Description:
My first halfway decent Gelphie thing. Done with the following prompt: 
Elphaba is in a cuddle mood,so she hugs Glinda at random times and really often,which surprise Glinda. (Bonus : Glinda pretends to denying her just to see the cute pout of Elphie and then run in her arms) Please ? :3
Don't ask where I got feels out of that. It's kind of what I do.
Author: theWickedWitchofFeels

Description:
Galinda has many qualities that people find attractive, both physically and mentally, and among those qualities is her imagination. 
But Elphaba, her roommate, isn't one of those people that admire Galinda's flights of fancy and when she finds one of Galinda's doodles depicting one such Fancy in particular, it may end in Galinda flying out the window without so much as a broom or bubble to soften her landing.
Author: BandraK

Description:
Crope and Tibbett are beginning to wonder why Galinda and Elphaba haven't told everyone they're dating yet. Bookverse, in case the presence of Crope and Tibbett didn't clue you in ;-) 
I may expand this. I say that about all my fics, though, so don't take it as a promise.
Author: regenderate

Description: Glinda and Elphaba are two girls living in the big city, who don't realize that it is their destiny to save both their world and the Not-So-Fictional land of Oz.
Author: fishstic
Fanfic_Title: Oz Is Closer Than You Think

Description:
Glinda convinces Elphaba to go to the beach.
Loosely inspired by a prompt by tumblr user the-frozen-nutella.
Author: Caliax

Description: A tale of Elphaba and Glinda in fifty sentences.
Author: goldenwanderer

Description: Wicked/MCU mashup.  Being the story of how one Elphaba Thropp came to work for SHIELD and lead the Avengers.
Author: Flikky
Fanfic_Title: The Wicked Witch: The First Avenger

Description: A story about falling from great heights.
Author: lotbe
Fanfic_Title: let's take a chance baby we can't lose

Description: On a whim, Elphaba Thropp thinks it's a good idea to kidnap Glinda the Good. She has to find out it is not.
Author: its_a_little_perky

Description: What if things had gone a bit different that night at the Ozdust.
Author: Deepy

Description: 25 years after the dead of the Wicked Witch, a young Fliaan hunter stumbles upon a cabin on the edge of the lake. Inside he finds two bodies and a writing desk full of handwritten journals. He starts to read the journals in hopes of identifying the bodies--and discovers a tale almost too extraordinary to believe.
Author: toastweasel

Description: In which Fiyero admits his biggest secret to someone unexpected, and learns a secret in return.
Author: Ltwillbush

Description:
day 3 of the 20 day theme challenge: get some sleep
Elphaba and Glinda are trapped in a shed, and *they* are closing in. Will the two of them survive the night, or will they give into their hopelessness?
(AKA I'm bad at summarizing, read it if you like zombies and Wicked and Gelphie.)
Author: vascool

Description:
day 2 of the 20 day theme challenge: reading quietly
When the new girl (who happened to be green-skinned) was roomed with Galinda, she expected a rivalry. What she found, was a friendship -- and possibly more.
Author: vascool

Description:
day 1 of the 20 day theme challenge: your arms around me
“You were devoted to Elphaba, you were,” said Nanny. “Everyone knew it.” Glinda reminisces of the time her and Elphaba spent in the Emerald City.
Author: vascool

Description: Summary: It's Galinda and Elphaba's first Valentine's Day together and Galinda hats a few surprises (or ten) for her girlfriend. COMPLETE
Author: FaerieTales4ever
Fanfic_Title: Ten Things I Love About You

Description: The Grimmerie is more powerful than anyone knows and when, following the events of Wicked, Glinda receives the book from a boy named Liir she discovers that these powers can help her rewrite the past and reunite her with long lost friends.
Author: somewhat_ethereal

Description: Based on a headcanon tumblr user sociallyawkwardandunstable sent to gelphieheadcanons: "Glinda swears she's hallucinating from the heat when she sees a flash of green skin and a crooked smile one hot summer's afternoon."
Author: regenderate

Description: A couple of snippets from Nanowrimo 2014. Modern AU, new roommates.
Author: hyphae

Description: it's a one shot of Glinda's thoughts on Elphie proposing to her.
Author: fishstic

Description: Modern AU: On this day, five years ago Elphie and Glinda started dating. Now Elphie has a surprise for Glinda. What could it be?
Author: fishstic

Description: What had she been thinking? Glinda didn't know, nor did she particularly want to know, the answer to that question. One-sided Gelphie.
Author: chaos_yet_harmony

Description: Sometimes it is best to write down our feelings in order to express them.
Author: Mustachebabs

Description: Elphaba was going to get a very stern, disgruntled talking to once Glinda hit the landing of the steps. The little blonde was then going to drag that darn girl back into their longingly warm queen sized bed and demonstrate just why their bed had been so warm and why they both needed to promptly return to it.
Author: Bayyvon

Description: The story runs just as it should; Cinderella will go to the ball. The Prince will find his true love. Everyone will live Happily Ever After. But things just don't seem...right. Will the characters of this Pantomime realise what's wrong with their world? Or will everything end at the stroke of Midnight?
Author: SimpleLampshade

Description: My ficlets for Femslash Yuletide 2014.
Author: Bouzingo

Description: They go rock climbing, Galinda gets stuck, the author is a meme.
Author: regenderate

Description: Tired of being looked at as a villain and living life on the run, Elphaba contemplates surrendering to the Witch Hunters when they come for her, but a certain bouncy blonde gives her hope in the darkness. Gelphie! Inspired by the song No One Is Alone from Into The Woods.
Author: FaerieTales4ever

Description: Elphaba thinks she sees Galinda cheating on her, but all is not as it appears. Inspired by Take Me or Leave Me from Rent. Gelphie goodness!
Author: FaerieTales4ever

Description: After the Defying Gravity scene, Glinda's perspective. Sorry it is short
Author: LorienLover1107

Description: Prompt from Tumblr: "GELPHIE prompt: Glinda wants to go clothes shopping and Elphie doesn't so they get into a fluffy argument and make up by kissing" PEOPLE WANT ME TO DO FLUFF SO HERE IS FLUFF. UNADULTERATED FLUFFINESS. And some other things - not completely the prompt, but mostly. He. Reviews make me smile. You are loved. Enjoy bbs <3
Author: EponineFaye

Description: Galinda and Elphaba kiss on a dare and it awakens some unexpected feelings. Can they work up the courage  to say how they really feel? #Gelphie!
Author: FaerieTales4ever
Fanfic_Title: I Won't Say I'm In Love

Description: Galinda is suspended from the sorcery seminar. Elphaba comforts her. (Gelphie is not explicit, only hinted)
Author: missthropphasapieshop

Description:
The race was planned to be a single lap around the track. Easy. They finished the lap in no time, both at almost the exact same time, neither of them breaking a sweat. Once the two passed the white line that signified the end of the race, it had been apparent that they both had the same thought going through their minds.
To keep going until one of them tired. [oneshot]

Description:
Elphaba Thropp is a snarky, introverted nerd. She's also green.
Galinda Upland is a rich, outgoing popular girl.
The two could not be more different, but they're forced to share a room together, and a strange and unique brand of friendship begins to bloom between them.
(The musical, for time's sake, skips over most of the time at Shiz. This story will be filling in the gaps, exploring the development and the intricacies of Elphaba and Galinda's friendship over their years in school.)
EDIT: ON HOLD FOR THE FORESEEABLE FUTURE- please see opening note for more details

Description: Elphaba had the same job almost everyday. Working at Disneyworld, at the Haunted Mansion. She loved the job, but it was the same almost every day. She had a few friends, but was hoping to be transferred to Hollywood Studios soon. That is until, a blonde girl comes onto the ride looking a little scared. Elphaba offers to ride with her as a joke, and surprisingly the girl accepts. Elphaba agrees, but later on after her shift is done. The two hang out more at the park, and more and more as the girl seems to show up more and more at Elphaba's job. Elphaba finally agrees to go to the park with the girl for an entire day, and this leads to a friendship and something they like to do more and more. Could this lead to more? Or is this just something Elphaba's doing to brighten up her job?
Author: Rayla_is_a_little_spoon
